Key.Name: CommonEnvironmentSettings
Key.SummaryComment: A list of common environment variable settings.
Key.RemarksComment: These environment variables are set for all tasks in jobs created under this <see cref="CloudJobSchedule"/> (including the Job Manager, Job Preparation and Job Release tasks).

Key.Name: Constraints
Key.SummaryComment: The execution constraints for jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.

Key.Name: DisplayName
Key.SummaryComment: A display name for all jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.

Key.Name: JobManagerTask
Key.SummaryComment: Details of a Job Manager task to be launched when a job is created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.

Key.Name: JobPreparationTask
Key.SummaryComment: The Job Preparation task for jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.
Key.RemarksComment: The Batch service will run the Job Preparation task on a compute node before starting any tasks of that job on that compute node.

Key.Name: JobReleaseTask
Key.SummaryComment: The Job Release task for jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.
Key.RemarksComment: The Batch service runs the Job Release task when the job ends, on each compute node where any task of the job has run.

Key.Name: PoolInformation
Key.SummaryComment: The pool on which the Batch service runs the tasks of jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.

Key.Name: Metadata
Key.SummaryComment: A list of name-value pairs associated with jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/> as metadata.

Key.Name: Priority
Key.SummaryComment: The priority of jobs created via this <see cref="JobSpecification"/>.
Key.RemarksComment: Priority values can range from -1000 to 1000, with -1000 being the lowest priority and 1000 being the highest priority.

Key.Name: UsesTaskDependencies
Key.SummaryComment: Whether tasks in jobs created under this <see cref="CloudJobSchedule"/> can define dependencies on each other.

Key.Name: OnAllTasksComplete
Key.SummaryComment: The action the Batch service should take when all tasks in the job are in the <see cref="Common.JobState.Completed"/> state.

Key.Name: OnTaskFailure
Key.SummaryComment: The action the Batch service should take when any task in the job fails.
Key.RemarksComment: A task is considered to have failed if it completes with a non-zero exit code and has exhausted its retry count, or if it had a scheduling error.
